title: I Just bought Rakan earlier and when I just got on I noticed that I bought the wrong person
body: I was wondering If I could trade in rakan for  Xayah because  I bought the wrong person and I have already used my refunds

replies.body: Just pony up the $10 and buy the champ you want

Anytime you buy champions, a confirmation box pops up to make sure you don't accidentally buy anything. If this was purely accidental, and you haven't used him yet (since it was an accident), hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we might be able to help.
What If I have only used him once or twice because I didnt know what to do and I wasnt thinking about the forums or anything like that and yes it was completely and accident
